import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../style.css' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { login } from '../actions/login' import context from 'react-bootstrap/esm/AccordionContext' function LoginForm({Login, error, adminUser, props}) { const [details, setDetails] = useState({name: "", email: "", password: ""}) const submitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault(); Login(details); props.login(state).then( (res) => context.router.push('/') ) } return (

Login

setDetails({...details, name: e.target.value})} value={details.name}/>
setDetails({...details, email: e.target.value})} value={details.email}/>
setDetails({...details, password: e.target.value})} value={details.password}/>
) } LoginForm.propTypes = { login: React.PropTypes.func.isRequired } export default connect(null, { login })(LoginForm);
